Text: Smoothdong believes that global warming is a scam.Could he please clarify why the temperature in my city has seen a steady rise in the past five years.And believe me,I can feel it.

You're all wrong, and you obviously have no idea what you're talking about.  Five years is not nearly long enough to be determinative as a trend.  Saying that it's colder everywhere else is retarded too.  What time frame?  Everywhere?  Really?  Average temps over any significant period of time will prove that statement wrong.

Do you even realize that the difference between the average temperatures during the last ice age and what we consider normal are only a few degrees C?  It doesn't take a huge change in average temp to have a global impact.
